subject: TB Patient tells his side of the controversy tonight!
body:
Tonight On CNN Email







June  6, 2007








 





9 p.m. ET


 

Larry King Live: TB Patient Exclusive


The TB-infected groom, his bride and his family speak out in their first prime-time interview. Hear their side of the international scare they say has made their lives hell.  Tonight at 9 ET!




































Related:• E-mail your questions for Andrew Speaker and his family







 
 





 




6:00 a.m. ET


 

American Morning


The crash site of Flight 93 is again a scene of strife. Its owner reportedly demanding millions, and victims' families are outraged.










 





6:00 p.m. ET


 

Lou Dobbs Tonight


Does President Bush hurts himself every time he says the Senate immigration plan is not amnesty?  An outspoken Oklahoma senator says yes!  He'll tell us why.








7:00 p.m. ET


 

The Situation Room


Breaking ranks with President Bush - Surprising candor from GOP heavy hitters at the CNN debate. Where will the race to '08 lead next?







9:00 p.m. ET


 

Larry King Live


The TB-infected groom, his bride and his family. Their side of the international scare they say has made their lives hell... in their first prime-time interview.







10:00 p.m. ET


 

Anderson Cooper 360


Record drought in the west, record hurricanes on the horizon and the kind of heat that kills by the thousands. What's behind the extreme weather?
